title: ISic000560. I.Sicily inscription 000560
body:
Facsimile Images

d(is) ((·)) m(anibus)
Fortis ((·)) Caesar(is) ((·)) ser(vus)
sibi ((·)) et ((·)) Charidi
coniugi ((·)) bene
5merenti ((·)) et ((·)) P(ublio) ((·)) Aelio
Aug(usti) ((·)) lib(erto) ((·)) felici ((·)) poste-
risq(ue) ((·)) suorum ((·)) fecit

Apparatus criticus

Text of CIL

English translation

To the spirits of the Underworld. Fortis, a slave of Caesar, made (this monument) for himself and his well-deserving wife Charis and for Publius Aelius Felix, freedman of Augustus, (and) for his own descendants

commentary

bibliography

    10.7308 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000589 Manganaro 1988 50 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001427
